price: 76. Gala albaabbada Naarta idinkoo ku waaraya dhexdeeda, maxay meel baas tahay rugta isla weynayaasha.
arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
